definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: He has invited me to dinner so many times,and I must reciprocate.
sentences.chinese: 他请我吃了很多次饭，我必须回请才是。

definition: to give a dinner party/to entertain guests/to invite to dinner
lit. proper behavior is based on reciprocity (idiom)/fig. to return politeness for politeness
to act as host/to do the honors
to entertain (for dinner)/to invite to dinner
to put some food aside for sb/to invite sb to stay for a meal/invitation to dinner
to hold a welcoming dinner or reception
to eat out/to eat at a restaurant
to do sb the honor (of attending etc)/to put in an appearance/to show up
